mapper.insert: insert into character_sets (`character_set_catalog`, `character_set_schema`, `character_set_name`, character_repertoire, form_of_use, default_collate_catalog, default_collate_schema, default_collate_name) values (#{characterSetCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{characterSetSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{characterSetName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{characterRepertoire,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{formOfUse,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{defaultCollateCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{defaultCollateSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{defaultCollateName,jdbcType=DISTINCT})
mapper.select: select `character_set_catalog`, `character_set_schema`, `character_set_name`, character_repertoire, form_of_use, default_collate_catalog, default_collate_schema, default_collate_name from character_sets
